Transform Data Module¶

Data transformation and cleaning utilities.

Helpers to harmonize column names between datasets, drop unused fields, compute grouped aggregates by branch and related dimensions, and merge the datasets.

src.modules.transform_data.drop_unnecessary_columns(df, dataset)¶

Drop unneeded columns for the specified dataset type.

Parameters:

  • df (DataFrame) – Input DataFrame.

  • dataset (str) – Dataset type, e.g. "performance" to also drop credit columns.

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

A DataFrame with unnecessary columns removed.

src.modules.transform_data.group_by_branch(df, value_col, new_col)¶

Compute per-branch averages over common grouping dimensions.

Groups by academic year, university type, sigles, study type, branch, gender, integration flag, and averages value_col.

Parameters:

  • df (DataFrame) – Input DataFrame.

  • value_col (str) – Name of the column to average.

  • new_col (str) – Name of the averaged column in the result.

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

A grouped DataFrame with averaged values and normalized column name.

src.modules.transform_data.harmonize_abandonment_columns(df)¶

Harmonize abandonment dataset columns.

Renames specific columns in the dropout dataset so they match the naming used by the performance dataset and downstream processing.

Parameters:

df (DataFrame) – Abandonment dataset.

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

A DataFrame with harmonized column names.

src.modules.transform_data.merge_datasets(df_perf, df_aband)¶

Merge performance and abandonment datasets on shared dimensions.

Parameters:

  • df_perf (DataFrame) – Performance dataset.

  • df_aband (DataFrame) – Abandonment dataset.

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

A merged DataFrame containing only matching rows across datasets.
